title: why the fuck are all the worlds games so early in the morning?
body:
im trying to catch a game so i can do this stupid mission that forces me to watch shit i dont like watching in the first place, and i cant because all the worlds games are ridiculously early in the mornings ranging from 3am-7am?  you do know people have jobs right? 

is there a way i can watch a replay or something and still get the 30 tokens mission rewards? someone help?
